name: Mosquitos Finance
description: Mosquitos Finance is a decentralized exchange with the most advanced perpetual yield farm running on Aptos Chain and Liquidswap DEX with lots of other curated features that let you earn additional rewards and enjoy the ecosystem. We created the $SUCKR token, which represents the native token of the Mosquitos Finance protocol. The protocol is equipped with some deflationary mechanisms that allow a constant price increase. Currently we're using the Liquidswap DEX, but we are going to deploy our own swap & exchange later on the way. At the moment our main focus is fully dedicated to add value into the system and create a suitable and sustainable environment for people to yield farm with high APR.
